There are two groups of global energy sources; non-renewable (fossil) and renewable. The renewable energy sources which have been investigated to displace the depleting fossil energy sources include solar, wind, nuclear, geothermal, hydrogen, waves, tidal and algal biomass energy [ 182, 183].
